body: @satchpangit I am pretty sure all the girls are virgins tho, because of their dialogues,the 1st girl might be knowledgeable but not experienced because she easily fell for the MC, it's all girls school so if she isn't virgin she should already have sexfriend somewhere but that doesn't seems to be the case,same with the female teacher, she's not in any relationship and she teaches in all girls school,even if it's not defloration,they most likely lost it to toys instead of other males
